definition.text: A Bonus Pool allocates the tokens to be distributed as bonuses for participating in certain Governance Programs. Each program that features a Token Bonus has its Bonus Pool defined under the Governance Programs section of the Superalgos Pools hierarchy. A bonus represents an incentive to participate in the given program and is displayed Tokens Bonus node.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
